quote: In order to control myself I must first accept myself by going with and not against my nature.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Actions are the seeds of fate. Deeds grow into destiny.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: I was wise enough to never grow up while fooling most people into believing I had.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: There are as many opinions as there are experts.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: It is in the darkness that one finds the light.
author: Meister Eckhart
